#summary TEX Archive Format

= Introduction =

TEX is a container format that is only used in Puyo Puyo Fever 2. It usually only contains SVR & SVP files (PS2), or GIM files (PSP).

== Header ==
0x00 - 0x03: 'TEX0'
 (4 bytes) Magic Code

0x04 - 0x07
 (4 bytes) Number of files in the TEX archive.

== Filename, File Offsets & File Size (starting at 0x10) ==
This is repeated for the number of files in the archive.

0x00 - 0x03
 (4 bytes) Extension part of the filename, excluding the leading dot (.)

0x04 - 0x07
 (4 bytes) Offset of the file in the archive.

0x08 - 0x0B
 (4 bytes) Size of the file in the archive.

0x0C - 0x1F
 (20 bytes) Filename for the file inside the archive, excluding the extension.
